headline.main: A Look at Egypt's Sweeping New Anti-Terrorism Law
headline.print_headline: A Look at Egypt's Sweeping New Anti-Terrorism Law

docs.snippet: Egypt's President Abdel-Fattah el-Sissi has approved a new draconian law that offers a sweeping definition of terrorism and sets harsh punishments, including heavy fines for journalists who don't toe the government line....
docs.lead_paragraph: Egypt's President Abdel-Fattah el-Sissi has approved a new draconian law that offers a sweeping definition of terrorism and sets harsh punishments, including heavy fines for journalists who don't toe the government line.

headline.main: NHL Players Among Those Fans Watching Blue Jays Take Flight
headline.print_headline: NHL Players Among Those Fans Watching Blue Jays Take Flight

docs.snippet: Logan Couture was just a preschooler when the Toronto Blue Jays won the World Series titles in 1992 and 1993. Wearing his team logo pajamas, the San Jose Sharks forward fought to stay awake to watch the games....
docs.lead_paragraph: Logan Couture was just a preschooler when the Toronto Blue Jays won the World Series titles in 1992 and 1993. Wearing his team logo pajamas, the San Jose Sharks forward fought to stay awake to watch the games.

headline.main: Top Ranking Still a Distant Dream for Andy Murray
headline.print_headline: Top Ranking Still a Distant Dream for Andy Murray

docs.snippet: Andy Murray claimed his 11th Masters 1000 title when he ended an eight-match losing streak against Novak Djokovic in the Rogers Cup final on Sunday, but when it comes to the game's top brass he is still the odd man out....
docs.lead_paragraph: Andy Murray claimed his 11th Masters 1000 title when he ended an eight-match losing streak against Novak Djokovic in the Rogers Cup final on Sunday, but when it comes to the game's top brass he is still the odd man out.

headline.main: Rower Who Crossed Atlantic Rescued Off North Carolina
headline.print_headline: Rower Who Crossed Atlantic Rescued Off North Carolina

docs.snippet: An American rower who crossed the Atlantic to raise AIDS awareness was rescued off North Carolina while rowing north on the final leg of the journey up the East Coast....
docs.lead_paragraph: An American rower who crossed the Atlantic to raise AIDS awareness was rescued off North Carolina while rowing north on the final leg of the journey up the East Coast.

headline.main: U.S. Says Deeply Regrets South Sudan Failed to Sign Peace Deal
headline.print_headline: U.S. Says Deeply Regrets South Sudan Failed to Sign Peace Deal

docs.snippet: The United States said it deeply regrets South Sudan's failure to sign a peace proposal by Monday's deadline, urged it to sign within 15 days and said it will look at how to raise pressure on those opposing the pact....
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States said it deeply regrets South Sudan's failure to sign a peace proposal by Monday's deadline, urged it to sign within 15 days and said it will look at how to raise pressure on those opposing the pact.

headline.main: Ted Cruz Megadonor Identified as Cellphone Executive

docs.snippet: Ben Nash, the chief executive of PCS Wireless, donated $250,000 to a “super PAC” supporting Senator Ted Cruz’s presidential campaign....

headline.main: Embattled Lawmakers' Ex-Aide: I Confronted Them About Affair
headline.print_headline: Embattled Lawmakers' Ex-Aide: I Confronted Them About Affair

docs.snippet: A former aide to embattled Michigan state Reps. Todd Courser and Cindy Gamrat said Monday that he was rebuffed when he confronted them about having an "inappropriate physical relationship."...
docs.lead_paragraph: A former aide to embattled Michigan state Reps. Todd Courser and Cindy Gamrat said Monday that he was rebuffed when he confronted them about having an "inappropriate physical relationship."

headline.main: U.N. Council Shows Support for Syria Mediator, Venezuela Unhappy
headline.print_headline: U.N. Council Shows Support for Syria Mediator, Venezuela Unhappy

docs.snippet: The United Nations Security Council expressed support for Syria mediation efforts on Monday, but in a rare move Venezuela dissociated itself from references in the statement to a political transition and a transitional governing body....
docs.lead_paragraph: The United Nations Security Council expressed support for Syria mediation efforts on Monday, but in a rare move Venezuela dissociated itself from references in the statement to a political transition and a transitional governing body.
